title: Reso 2008-243 Citywide Records Retention Schedule
publisher: United States of America : City of Fresno, California.
description: the keeping of certain records is not necessary nor legally requ1red after the passage of certain periods of time for the effective and efficient operation of the City of Fresno: and WHEREAS, Resolution No. [...] The provisions of Section 2 do not authonze the destruction of: (a} Records affectlng the title to real property or liens thereon (b) Court records (c) Records required to be kept by statutes (d) Non transient records that are less than two years old {e) The minutes, ordinances, or resolutions of the Council of the City of Fresno or of a City board or commission SECTION 4.
